about_the_game:
Bowlatro, is a rogue-lite experience where every throw is unpredictable, every frame is a test of skill, and every game is a unique challenge. Unlock powerful abilities, experiment with crazy modifiers, and choose from a variety of balls to create your bowling strategy.

Powerful Relics: Choose Your Path

Each game of Bowlatro begins with a relic selection, granting you a unique ability that reshapes your strategy and gameplay. Relics provide powerful perks but can come with risks or trade-offs, making every choice meaningful. Discover new relics as you progress and experiment with different playstyles to find your ideal setup.

Examples of Relics:

  • Explosive Pin: Transforms a normal pin into an explosive one that sends nearby pins flying on impact, creating chain reactions and boosting your score potential.

  • Strike Specialist: Boosts your score by 50% for each strike, but pins hit on your second shot no longer count. It’s a high-risk, high-reward relic that rewards precision.

  • Pin Reroller: Rerolls the number of active pins each frame, giving you control over the setup and adding unpredictability to every throw.

  • Bumpers: Add bumpers that make it impossible to hit the gutters.

Each relic transforms your approach, opening up new strategies to help you tackle the challenges ahead. Choose wisely and watch your game evolve!

Unpredictable Bowling Lanes

Forget the usual ten pins! In Bowlatro, each frame features a random number of active pins, creating a fresh challenge every time. Your goal is to knock down a randomly generated target number of pins. No two games are ever the same!

Dynamic Item Shop: Customize Your Game

Every three frames, the item shop opens, offering a range of items that allow you to customize and enhance your gameplay. Items range from unique pins with special effects to modifiers that amplify your score, letting you tailor each game to your style and strategy. Try different item combinations to uncover powerful synergies!

Examples of Items:

  • Baby Pin Launcher: Adds a pin that, when hit, launches two smaller pins in different directions, increasing your chances to knock down even more pins.

  • Grapple Pin: Hooks onto the farthest pin in the lane and pulls it closer, perfect for those banana split scenarios.

  • Score Multiplier Reroll: Multiplies your score based on the number of rerolls you’ve used.

With each item purchase, you gain new ways to approach the game, encouraging creativity and experimentation with each run.

Unlock and Master Unique Balls

As you progress, unlock new balls that completely change the way you play. From altering physics to introducing wild new mechanics, each ball offers a fresh and exciting twist to the gameplay.

Ascension Modifiers: Evolving Challenges

Winning a game in Bowlatro is just the beginning. Each victory unlocks a new Ascension Modifier, a game-changing twist that raises the stakes and keeps the gameplay fresh. These modifiers alter the core mechanics, testing your skills and creativity as you adapt to increasingly challenging scenarios.

Examples of Ascension Modifiers:

  • Pins Farther Apart: Pins spawn farther away from each other, making it harder to achieve that perfect strike.

  • Reduced Earnings: Earn less money per game, forcing you to make tough decisions in the item shop.

  • Stronger Pins: Pins become harder to knock down, requiring more power or strategic modifiers to succeed.

Every ascension adds a layer of depth and replayability.
